content.question: Which of the following statements best describes what the data in the map suggest about African American culture?

choices.label: African American culture in the North was stifled by the significant increase of Black southern migrants.
African American culture in urban areas was further enhanced by the Harlem Renaissance.
African American culture in the rural South was largely replaced by urban cultural influences.
African American culture in cities across the nation was greatly influenced by Black southern culture.

content.answer: African American culture in cities across the nation was greatly influenced by Black southern culture.

skill.text: 2.D: Describe and draw conclusions from patterns, trends, and limitations in data, making connections to relevant course content.
